subject: Simsonn Manager
description_text:
My pedals were working fine then I installed the Simsonn Manager, which
there is no clear guidance on which version to install, then I installed
the update that was available and now the program will not work and my
pedals will not work. I tried to uninstall the Manager program and it
cannot be uninstalled. Now my pedals do not work at all. How do I uninstall
this program or how do I fix this?

conversations.body_text: Hi John Zoeller,  Could you please let me know the model of your pedals? This issue can be resolved by updating the firmware.

I have the 2 pedal Pro X model. Also, after I installed the update the main
program was in Chinese and it was only a partial install as the main screen
was not all there. The pedals worked great before I installed the Simsonn
Manager, I was just hoping to tweak them a little for different cars I
drive.

On Fri, Sep 26, 2025, 10:28 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi John Zoeller,         In SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0, you can switch the interface to English. Please try a manual firmware update:    Press and hold the upgrade button on the control box, then reconnect the USB cable.    The software will indicate that it has entered Flash update mode.    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-prox.sfu.    Once the update is complete, please test the device again.

That seems to have worked! Thank you for your help!

On Sat, Sep 27, 2025, 8:33 AM service@simsonn.com
I was told exactly what to do to fix my issue and it worked! The response time was also very quick and appreciated. Thank you
